nodes.text: To'hok Neige was a location with luminous amber skies where the Galactic Empire's 204th Imperial Fighter Wing had once operated alongside the unit of Colonel Madrighast years prior to the battle at the planet Chadawa in 5 ABY. As a reward for his service, Madrighast was given the Imperial-class Star Destroyer Unyielding.
To'hok Neige was mentioned in the 2021 novel Victory's Price, written by Alexander Freed.
